name: Nature`s Secrets Carrot Face Wash
description: Nature's Secret Carrot soft facial wash for normal to dry skin. Revitalize your skin, restoring essential moisture and preventing dryness. Contains carrot extract with all natural vitamin A and skin beneficial anti-oxidants. Skin Friendly at pH 5.5-6.0 and 100% soap free. Give your skin a ‘younger age’. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
